text: Jasprit Bumrah (born 6 December 1993) is an Indian cricketer who represents the Indian national team as a right-arm fast-medium bowler. He is recognized for his exceptional bowling skills, accurate yorkers, and unique bowling action. Bumrah has been considered one of the best bowlers in the world and has played a significant role in the success of the Indian cricket team across all formats. He plays for Mumbai Indians in the Indian premier league. == References == Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Indian cricketers
title: Jasprit Bumrah
